item.sql: select video.info_id, video.title, video.createtime, video.RELEASETIME, (case status when 1 then '已发布' else '未发布' end) as status, (case videostatus when 0 then '未上传' when 1 then '转码中' else '转码成功' end) as videostatus, decode(video.playcount,null,0,video.playcount,video.playcount) as playcount, (select count(*) from app_faorite where comtype=2 and finfo_id=video.info_id) as goodcount, (select count(*) from app_faorite where comtype=3 and finfo_id=video.info_id) as likecount from app_mobilemenu m inner join app_videostudy video on m.info_id = video.menuid where m.info_id=[menuid] and video.status<>-1
